com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.os.validator.pattern.attribute
Class DeployAttributeInvalidPathnameValidator

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator.pattern.attribute.DeployAttributeValidator
      com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.os.validator.pattern.attribute.DeployAttributeInvalidPathnameValidator
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator.pattern.attribute.IDeployAttributeValidator
public class DeployAttributeInvalidPathnameValidator
extends com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator.pattern.attribute.DeployAttributeValidator

Validate that an attribute value is a valid pathname for the hosting operating system

Creates a ICoreProblemType.OBJECT_ATTRIBUTE_INVALID if the value of the attribute is not type-valid

Constructor Detail

DeployAttributeInvalidPathnameValidator

public DeployAttributeInvalidPathnameValidator(java.lang.String validatorID,
                                               org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EAttribute attribute)
Construct a validator for check for validation of an attribute against a pathname rules for hosting operating system.

This constructor sets the isRequired() default to false.

Parameters:
validatorID - the validator identifier.
attribute - the attribute to be validated as a pathname

                                               boolean required)
Construct a validator for check for validation of an attribute against a pathname rules for hosting operating system

Parameters:
validatorID - the validator identifier.
attribute - the attribute to be validated as a pathname
required - true if the attribute is not permitted to be null or empty.

Parameters:
